channel.title: [317] real starter message help! [317]
channel.description:
SOURCE: DELTA
Guys I would like to make a starter message like the one on tutorial island, when you first join the game. I am not talking about sM's.
Here is a pic of what I mean:
[s][IMG]http://i797.photobucket.com/albums/yy257/xxDANxx1/free_chardesign-1.jpg[/img][/s]
If anyone can help in any way it would be great :)
Thank you.
